name: tm46
effect: Teaches Thief to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Thief to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Psywave)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: While attacking, it may steal the foe’s held item.
flavor_text.emerald: While attacking, it may steal the foe’s held item.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack that may take the foe’s held item if the user isn’t holding one.
